name: Minimalist Folding Bag
description:
Small minimalist folding bag with zipper accessing both sides of the inside. Slinky strap with knots. Can be worn both ways. 
 Black full grain cow hide with brown suede interior.
productDetails:

Style type: Shoulder Bag
Size: W: 8" (20cm) / H: 5.5" (14cm)
Length of Shoulder Strap: 48" (122cm)
Type of Closure: Zipper
Material 100% Leather
Color: Black
Interior: Brown Suede

Black cow hide with brown suede interior.

name: Geometry Shoulder Bag
description:
Don says this is the geometric bag that all the hippies used to wear. Everyone had this in the 70s, but no one had the zipper figured out. Two snap button adjusts the size. Strap also adjustable.
Black cow hide with brown suede interior.
